Body: 'Homonym' usually means same spelling (=homograph) and same pronunciation (=homophone) so what you describe would be better referred to as 'homograph confusion'. But in my experience what you describe is usually called 'orthographic ambiguity' in the linguistic literature.

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: I am a rock climber & a linguist.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: I am a rock climber & a linguist.
